document_data.name: Watermen's Circle
document_data.mainbody: '''Watermen's Circle''' was the guildhall for ferrymen and other watermen in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located along [[Kaoth Alley]] in the southern section of Daggerford near the [[River Gate]]. It was one of the larger buildings found along Kaoth Alley.
